get.operationId: Get Recurring Transactions for a Virtual Account

parameters.name: instrumentId
parameters.description: The ID of the instrument (account) to filter transactions for.

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: The search filter string to apply to transaction descriptions or references.

parameters.name: Start
parameters.description: The date and time to start filtering transactions from.

parameters.name: End
parameters.description: The date and time to end filtering transactions at.

parameters.name: TagIds
parameters.description: The integer IDs of the tags to filter by.

parameters.name: SortField
parameters.description: The field to sort the results by.

parameters.name: TransactionType
parameters.description: The type of transactions to include.

parameters.name: SortDirection
parameters.description: The direction to sort the results.

parameters.name: UntaggedOnly
parameters.description: Only include untagged transactions.

parameters.name: ExcludeNetZero
parameters.description: Exclude transactions where the amount has been offset to zero.
